pullrequest.title: Remove created cameras in scene manager from camera's destructor

content.raw: The case can happen if someone calls `destroyCamera` somewhere outside the destructor of **OgreCamera** or `destroyAllCameras`is called and exists some **unique\_ptr** or **shared\_ptr** holding a reference to an **OgreCamera** \(\`this->ogrecamera\` should be destroyed anyway, since the object holds a raw pointer but the instantiated camera  would still hold a pointer with garbage\)
content.html: The case can happen if someone calls destroyCamera somewhere outside the destructor of OgreCamera or destroyAllCamerasis called and exists some unique_ptr or shared_ptr holding a reference to an OgreCamera (`this->ogrecamera` should be destroyed anyway, since the object holds a raw pointer but the instantiated camera would still hold a pointer with garbage)
